website_summaries.verdict: Appears to be a standard charger but conceals a reliable high definition hidden camera capable of livestreaming or recording video for added peace of mind. Works as a phone charger, too.
pros: Looks and works like a charger, so no one would expect it's also a hidden camera
Extremely easy to use — just plug it in and start recording
Has WiFi connectivity and is compatible with an app that's user-friendly and works with IOS and Android
cons: Occasional issues connecting to WiFi and with malfunctioning motion detection have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Nice little USB camera.
customer_reviews.text: This hidden spy camera looks like any other USB phone charger. It is easy to setup and use. I suggest you install the app first before you connect it to wifi. The camera records up to 1080p resolution. However, it does not record sound. Comes with lots of cables. It handles up to a 128 memory card. U can control everything through the provided app.
customer_reviews.author: Vin Cente

customer_reviews.title: Very Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great spy camera. It works well and it also records clean. Great device, and I recommend this to anyone looking for a gadget if this type.
customer_reviews.author: Shadrach

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The box came with no plastic wrap, the male to male cord is missing. I can't connect the device to my pc for surveillance which defeats the entire purpose of me wanting this unit. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: D Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Handy little camera
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything you need for quick set up and use. Download the app, set it up and get recording! It’s very easy to use and gets good video. Only negative is you can get cheaper ones, and the view is kind of restricted by where you have outlets, unless you get an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Stoobs

customer_reviews.title: Stealth, discreet and functional
customer_reviews.text: The main difference between this option and other ones is that it looks just like any other USB charger so no one would care to even inspect it closer. roughly the same size factor as any other charger, all black. it disappears with the other other chargers in the room. The setup is intuitive and easy as well. image quality is great a little bit grainy in low light but very useable overall. if you want the lowest chances of discovery, this is probably your best bet !
customer_reviews.author: San Francisco customer

customer_reviews.title: *CONNECTION PROBLEMS*
customer_reviews.text: "JHCAMERA" APP REQUIRED TO VIEW CAMERA OVER WIFI IS "IFFY" IT IS VERY DIFFICULT TO ACHEIVE A CONNECTION TO THE DEVICE. IT WILL ATTEMP TO RECONNECT WITH CAMERA AND IS NEVER SUCCESSFUL IN GAINING A CONNECTION. IV INCLUDED PICTURES TO SHOW I AM CONNECTED BY WIFI TO CAMERA BUT THE APP IS UNABLE TO COMMUNICATE WITH CAMERA. I HAVE ANDROID 9 AND ALL PERMISSIONS HAVE BEEN GRANTED. IV EVEN UNPLUGGED AND RESET THE CAMERA AND I STILL HAVE TROUBLE. TO DEVELOPER: PLEASE UPDATE YOUR APP TO FIX CONNECTION ISSUES!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Young

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t record sound and can’t hold a good wireless connection. Has to be within 5 feet of router it seems
customer_reviews.author: colton

customer_reviews.title: Android app is useless regardless of what device is used.
customer_reviews.text: Spent 45 minutes with this pos following their poor instructions, and the app does not recognize any of the connections. Manual wifi connection does nothing. Automatic times out, no issue on my networks end. And the direct connection via the devices own wifi is also not recognized by the app. Completely useless. No errors given and no possible solutions. Returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Sean PE

customer_reviews.title: does not connect to wifi
customer_reviews.text: This device did not connect to my wifi no matter how many attempts to connect, reset the device, etc. The only way it would work was when I connected to direct view mode but that requires you be within 18 feet distance from the camera to view. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: AUDREY

customer_reviews.title: Please read before you buy!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t do bad reviews but I bought to keep an eye on our baby and make sure he’s okay and to my shock, this camera literally failed me. I honestly dislike this camera. It does not work and the app is inefficient. The SD card that came with it is so cheaply made it literally broke the first day using it. The camera wouldn’t turn on and wouldn’t even connect with my WiFi. I wish I had just spent money on a regular camera i could just put an SD card into and plug later to my computer. This was a waste of money and I really regret it because they have such great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua O. Okpara

customer_reviews.title: Built well, but......
customer_reviews.text: So I was pretty excited about this device based on the reviews. It’s shell is built very well, however the software that allows it to connect to the WiFi is horrible. Even with it near my router it is has a very bad lag time. Usually someone walking by is missed because of how bad the lag is. Which in my opinion makes the device useless. Giving two stars because of how nice the construction is and that I was able to successfully connect the app to the camera easily. Otherwise it would be a zero.
customer_reviews.author: B.s

customer_reviews.title: Easyset up, clear picture, easy for non-tech-savy people
customer_reviews.text: Easiest, fastest set up ever! I am so happy I bought this. I've relied other nanny camps and they're a nightmare to set up. So I bought both versions. I looked at how to set up video on YouTube ahead of time, but honestly, the instructions themselves were easy enough. This was by far the easiest and fastest to set up. App worked great, picture quality is impressive. Dont forget to wait 10 secs after unplugging, before plugging it back in or removing the micro SD card, so u can avoid corrupting ur files (learned that in the YouTube channel, thank you very much 😉). So pleased, I'm buying another two!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Discrete Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has proven to be very discrete and can monitor areas without being noticeable. The primary reason for the purchase was to monitor my kids activity when playing video games. Besides from being discrete, I can monitor the video stream from anywhere with the free Android App that is available for it. I was surprised at the quality of the streaming video and it doesn't use that much memory for the videos stored. I think it is an awesome way to monitor activity remotely. It's funny when the kids tell me one thing, but I really know what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was very easy to set up, took me no more than 5 min. You can set it up anywhere there is a power outlet and wifi access. In the box it comes with extra wires and chords for hooking it upFor my application, you can see I am using it in my kitchen to watch the stove when cooking, but to also not have my friends come over and make jokes that I have a camera in the kitchen. The applications for this camera are endless. With an SD card (supply your own) you can even use it as a hidden security camera with play back functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Marsella

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Inconspicuous spy cam!
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to find the app and get it connected to wifi. But once that got resolved, its a pretty neat gadget with flexible use. We plan on using it as a makeshift baby monitor. I'd imagine it be great for monitoring pets and intruders.
customer_reviews.author: akl

customer_reviews.title: Cannot place where you may want to record.
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat little camera. It was fairly easy to set up. Wi fi worked well. App worked well. Alerts u to motion. Information not great but I figured it out. Time setting is on a 24 hr clock and is confusing. No directions found, hard to understand. I returned this product since u plug it into an outlet. My outlets didn't work for where I wanted to video tape. This is a problem. Outlets are low. Many items in the way: couch, table, chairs. Also outlets may not face where you want to record.
customer_reviews.author: Greenb4greenwascool

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: So you get what you pay for I guess. I know in this size and class of the unit there are limitations. Just a couple of tricks I was having wifi issues and had to put a repeater close to the unit. Video does not automatically record in 1040p, every couple of days it tells me SD needs to be reformatted. The vendor did ship me a replacement unit which I am going to set up and try out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to connect, but quality is great
customer_reviews.text: It's a very convincing spy cam, especially when you place the sticker on the back, my biggest concern is someone stealing it to use as a charger. Image quality is better than some of my security cams. There is no sound recording, but that's fine for my purposes, my biggest con is that it's difficult to connect and the instructions are somewhat incomplete.
customer_reviews.author: Parris

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a discreet camera
customer_reviews.text: PROS: * Easy to setup. * Simple to use. * Very discreet. * 1080p recording. * Hides WiFi SSID after setup for extra incognitoness! CONS: * Isn't supplied with an SD Card. * Doesn't record sound.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Millerband

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job! Very easy setup and just works from the box.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It is so discreet as a security camera. And functions very well at the same time. You can choose to record videos or take photos from the app and because it connects to your wifi router you can view it remotely. Very cool and ingenious idea. It does a great job and setup was a breeze. And they included a bunch of other cool stuff like a micro USB cable that also doubles as an iPhone cable and a MicroSD to USB adapter! Nice. Overall really impressed and at the price you cannot go wrong. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ioni

customer_reviews.title: It is the size I thought.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to check out the second living room. It is the size I thought. It is small and just right. it seems that some inexperienced people have trouble connecting wifi and camera. However, if you follow the instructions step by step it is so easy. there is no problem at all. It's a really interesting this small one.
customer_reviews.author: Youngsun Kim

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly pretty neat - and useful. I often need to keep an eye on my younger kids when I'm not around, and this is the perfect size to stay hidden, its high definition picture quality is clear so I never miss anything vital, the options on the app for recording and motion detection is super easy to configure. The whole thing is very user-friendly, which was really refreshing to see. I would recommend this to anyone that needs a similar product.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than 60 days don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy and picture quality was pretty good. Seem to be very warm. Used it a few times I was out of town. Now nothing. Cold and can't get it to reset, or connect. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Dog

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it and more
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product! I use it to monitor my door to see who comes in and out and it really works great. It also comes with a motion detector that notifies me whenever it senses a movement which also is a nice feature as I can get a real-time notification whenever I’m in the room or at work. This is definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Anubis

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera to watch my shop.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good little camera, works well and was easy to set up. I just needed a small camera that I could set up in my shop so I could check on it once in a while when I’m not around. It didn’t need to be hidden, just unobtrusive, and this came with a charger which I also needed, so it was a good deal! Setup was pretty easy, and the quality if video was good.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy on Anazon

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation great picture
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy. It was basically plug and play and you download the mobile app and configure. I have it installed in my office not necessarily because I wanted to be discreet but I didn't want my office to look like a prison cell. The viewing angle is decent and the resolution is great especially for the small footprint.

customer_reviews.title: Great for catching sandwich thieves
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is minimal and simple. It’s exactly what most packaging should be. Upon opening the box, the item seems to be in good condition and looks decently made. I got this camera with the intention of catching the thief who stole my thanksgiving sandwich. It’s Turkey and the bun in the middle is called the most maker. It’s not just any sandwich, it’s the best. I caught the thief, anyway
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: keep an eye out on things
customer_reviews.text: With everything going on now our company decided to have most us working remotely from home, me included. That usually means 1 person at the office at a time. With this camera it was easy to just plug in and keep an eye on things. It really helps when a customer walks in a my guys have to go to the back warehouse and I could just watch from home. We conveniently have a socket on the back wall that worked out perfectly to see the entire room. Camera works just perfectly for what I wanted it for.

customer_reviews.title: 1080P, Smooth Live Stream to a nice App, Easy instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is incredibly easy to setup, just pop it open and use right away. The app, while it has low star ratings on the play store, worked incredibly fast for me (unsure why it's so low, I was not expecting much like other bad products but it worked like a charm). It connects, almost as fluid as Zmodo or Nest camera apps. Once running, the app is super smooth! You can see everything the camera sees up to 1080 P and it detects motion well and tells you. The TF capability is great too! All in all, great camera. If only it had night vision...

customer_reviews.title: Very good spy camera

So if base don your outlet orientation you will literally see a vertical sliver, going from floor to ceiling.

customer_reviews.text: Manufacturer sent me two that are assured to work. One worked - other did not. So 1 out of 3 operate correctly. Again, Gamble at your own risk. 2 out of three doesn't work. Lost money.

product_meta.title: Spy Camera Wireless Hidden WiFi Camera with Remote View - HD 1080P - Spy Camera Charger - Spy Camera Wireless - USB Hidden Camera - Nanny Camera - Premium Security Camera - Hidden Cam - iOS Android
product_meta.description:
AlphaTech Wireless Spy Camera Charger is the easiest way to protect personal property and businesses.

Catch cheaters, frauds, thieves. Keep an eye on employees, customers, babysitters, nannies, caregivers at home, work, office, etc.

Know more with the Hidden Camera Charger, and catch much critical information for your needs with Remote Monitor!

Discrete design without sounds and indicators. It makes your camera completely undetectable by any scanners.

MAIN FEATURES: 
- Quick Plug and Play 1080P Full HD Camera
- Live View Feature and the App for iOS and Android
- Two modes: Direct Mode (HotSpot) and Remote Viewing Mode.
- Supports the large-capacity SD card: from 128GB to 4GB (SD card not included)
- Hidden Memory Card Slot on the Rear Panel
- Built-In Surge Protection saves SD card from corruption
- Supports Dual-Frequencies WiFi routers, works on 2.4G
- 2-Year Manufacturer Warranty.
- 24/7 Customer Support.

YOU GET:
1 x AlphaTech IQ Hidden Camera
1 x User Guide
1 x Male-to-Male USB Cord 

BONUSES:
1 x 2-in-1 Charging Cable
1 x MicroSD Card Reader

Protect Yourself Now! by clicking ‘Add to Cart’
feature_bullets: EASY TO USE REMOTE VIEW: Plug the spy camera charger into an outlet, download APP and connect your camera. Monitor your home, office in real-time on your phone no matter where you are with the WiFi Hidden Camera.
PROTECT PERSONAL PROPERTY AND BUSINESSES: Catch cheaters, frauds, and thieves. Keep an eye on employees, customers, babysitters, nannies, and caregivers at home, work, offices, hotels, etc.

KNOW MORE: Catch more critical information for your needs with H.264 performance and 128GB Card (not included) can hold videos up to 15 days. Keep an eye on your children with wifi nanny camera to make sure they're in safe hands.
UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: APP supports both systems IOS and Android. You can record videos on the microSD card, download, and playback videos on your phone.
BEST SUPPORT: AlphaTech warm service team will be with you. Provide 30-days fast refund without needing to return, 12-months warranty and lifetime professional using guidance.
